original_text: Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes, and they shall condemn him to death,
korean_text: 보라 우리가 예루살렘으로 올라가노니 인자가 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 넘겨지매 그들이 죽이기로 결의하고

sentences.original_text: Behold, we go up to Jerusalem
and the Son of man shall be betrayed
unto the chief priests and unto the scribes
and they shall condemn him to death
